TITLE: Basic Button Example in HTML DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates the usage of a basic button component. SOURCE: https://github.com/allianz/ng-aquila/blob/main/projects/ng-aquila/src/button/button.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Angular Module for NgX Documentation UI Integration DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates how to configure the AppModule to integrate the NgX Documentation UI. It imports the necessary modules and tokens, sets up basic routing with a redirect to the welcome page, and provides the documentation manifest to the module. SOURCE: https://github.com/allianz/ng-aquila/blob/main/projects/ngx-docs-ui/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` import { NXV_MANIFEST_TOKEN, NxvDocumentationModule } from '@aposin/ngx-docs-ui'; import * as NX_MANIFEST from '@aposin/ng-aquila/documentation/manifest.json'; import { RouterModule } from '@angular/router'; const ROUTES = [ { path: '', pathMatch: 'full', redirectTo: '/welcome', }, ]; @NgModule({ imports: [RouterModule.forRoot(ROUTES, { enableTracing: false }), NxvDocumentationModule.forRoot()], providers: [{ provide: NXV_MANIFEST_TOKEN, useValue: NX_MANIFEST }], }) export class AppModule {} ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Dynamic Checkbox Groups DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to implement dynamically generated checkbox groups. SOURCE: https://github.com/allianz/ng-aquila/blob/main/projects/ng-aquila/src/checkbox/checkbox.md#2025-04-22_snippet_12 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating Dynamic Table with Data Only in Angular DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows how to create a dynamic table by passing only the data, without column definitions. The table will use property names as column headers and display all data. SOURCE: https://github.com/allianz/ng-aquila/blob/main/projects/ng-aquila/src/dynamic-table/dynamic-table.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Adding ng-aquila to Angular Project DESCRIPTION: Command to add ng-aquila to an existing Angular project using ng add. SOURCE: https://github.com/allianz/ng-aquila/blob/main/projects/ng-aquila/documentation/guides/getting-started.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: console CODE: ``` ng add @aposin/ng-aquila ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Integrating Axe Accessibility Testing in TypeScript DESCRIPTION: TypeScript example showing how to integrate the Axe accessibility testing library into automated tests. This helps detect accessibility violations during development or testing phases. SOURCE: https://github.com/allianz/ng-aquila/blob/main/projects/ng-aquila/src/accessibility/accessibility.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` axe.run(actual, {}, (error: Error, results: axe.AxeResults) => { if (results.violations.length) { // report violations } }); ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Injecting Data into Modal Component in TypeScript DESCRIPTION: Shows how to inject data into a modal component using the NX_MODAL_DATA token. SOURCE: https://github.com/allianz/ng-aquila/blob/main/projects/ng-aquila/src/modal/modal.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` import { Component, Inject } from '@angular/core'; import { NX_MODAL_DATA } from '@aposin/ng-aquila/modal'; @Component({ selector: 'your-dialog', template: 'passed in {{ data.name }}', }) export class YourDialog { constructor(@Inject(NX_MODAL_DATA) readonly data: any) {} } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Radio Button with Reactive Forms DESCRIPTION: Implementation of radio buttons using reactive forms approach, demonstrating form control integration. Each method returns a NxMessageToastRef that can be used to control the toast. SOURCE: https://github.com/allianz/ng-aquila/blob/main/projects/ng-aquila/src/message/message.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` // Simple message toast with a custom text let toastRef: NxMessageToastRef = messageToastService.open('My message toast text'); // Message toast with a custom template let toastRef: NxMessageToastRef = messageToastService.openFromTemplate(myTemplateRef); // Message toast from a custom component let toastRef: NxMessageToastRef = messageToastService.openFromComponent(myComponent); ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Updating to Angular 18 CLI Commands DESCRIPTION: Commands for updating both Angular core/CLI and Ng-Aquila to version 18 SOURCE: https://github.com/allianz/ng-aquila/blob/main/projects/ng-aquila/documentation/guides/releases.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` ng update @angular/cli @angular/core ``` LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` ng update @aposin/ng-aquila --force ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Basic File Uploader Usage DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates basic implementation of the file uploader component with built-in HTTP POST functionality and response handling SOURCE: https://github.com/allianz/ng-aquila/blob/main/projects/ng-aquila/src/file-uploader/file-uploader.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Adding ng-aquila Styles to Angular Configuration DESCRIPTION: JSON configuration to add ng-aquila base styles and theme to angular.json file. SOURCE: https://github.com/allianz/ng-aquila/blob/main/projects/ng-aquila/documentation/guides/getting-started.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` "architect": { "build": { "builder": "@angular-devkit/build-angular:browser", "options": { // ... "styles": [ // ... "node_modules/@aposin/ng-aquila/css/normalize.css", "node_modules/@aposin/ng-aquila/themes/aposin.css" ] } } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using Custom Tokens in Styles DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to use custom-defined tokens in SCSS styles after importing the theme file. SOURCE: https://github.com/allianz/ng-aquila/blob/main/projects/ng-aquila/src/theming/theming.md#2025-04-22_snippet_7 LANGUAGE: scss CODE: ``` @import '/.scss'; .test-class { background: nx-theme(my-new-token); } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Implementing Deletable Tags with Custom Actions DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to set up deletable tags and utilize the component's addTag and clearTags methods, along with custom business logic and validation. SOURCE: https://github.com/allianz/ng-aquila/blob/main/projects/ng-aquila/src/taglist/taglist.md#2025-04-22_snippet_10 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Implementing Phone Input with Forms DESCRIPTION: Example demonstrating how to use the phone input component with Angular forms (both template-driven and reactive). The control expects values in the format '+'.
